text: Innum, avarkalutaiya napi avarkalitam, "niccayamaka avarutaiya aracatikarattirku ataiyalamaka unkalitam oru taput (pelai) varum; atil unkalukku, unkal iraivanitam iruntu arutal (kotukkak kutiyavai) irukkum; innum, musavin cantatiyinarum; harunin cantatiyinarum vittuc cenravarrin mitam ullavaiyum irukkum; atai malakkukal (vanavarkal) cumantu varuvarkal; ninkal muhminkalaka iruppin niccayamaka itil unkalukku attatci irukkinratu" enru kurinar
